= Installation instructions for Windows =

  ==Base dependencies==
  * [http://www.python.org/getit/ Python 2.7]
  * Java 1.7
  * Sox
  * CMU sphinx 0.4.1. You can use these [http://code.google.com/p/voiceid/downloads/detail?name=win_sphinx_binary_files.zip&can=2&q=binary binary] files (Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Express Edition is required) and put them in enviroment variable.
  * GStreamer (ex. [http://code.google.com/p/ossbuild/downloads/detail?name=GStreamer-WinBuilds-LGPL-x86-Beta04-0.10.7.msi&can=2&q= GStreamer-WinBuilds])
  * [http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ Vlc]
  
  ==GUI dependencies ==
  * wxPython 2.8.12 (ex. [http://sourceforge.net/projects/wxpython/files/wxPython/2.8.12.1/wxPython2.8-win32-unicode-2.8.12.1-py27.exe/download?use_mirror=garr wxPython2.8-win32-unicode-2.8.12.1-py27 ])
  * Mplayer 0.6.9 (ex. [http://sourceforge.net/projects/smplayer/files/SMPlayer/0.6.9/smplayer-0.6.9-win32.exe/download smplayer-0.6.9-win32])
  * [http://pypi.python.org/packages/any/M/MplayerCtrl/MplayerCtrl-0.3.3.linux-i686.exe#md5=c5eafb16e5ab4c2517a9568e2bbd9fe4 MplayerCtrl-0.3.3]

*All dependencies should be [http://searchsystemschannel.techtarget.com/feature/Setting-Windows-7-environment-variables included] in the system path.*
